author: Joseph Guzman
title: CDC considering advising everyone to wear a mask to protect against coronavirus - The Hill
description: CDC considering advising everyone to wear a mask to protect against coronavirus The Hill US surgeon general details spread of coronavirus and debate over masks l ABC News ABC News US Surgeon General Suggests a National Stay-at-home Order Amid Coronavirus News…
content:
The U.S. surgeon generals office has asked the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) to reconsider its initial guidance encouraging the general public not to wear masks as the novel coronavirus continues to spread throughout the U.S.
